subject: Re: Junit4.9b1 not work
msgSnippet: Emanuela, Have you tried with junit-4.8.2.jar?  Do you have the same problem? David
messageBody:
Emanuela,

Have you tried with junit-4.8.2.jar? Do you have the same problem?

David

On Wed, Jan 19, 2011 at 5:35 AM, Emanuela <manuspa_72@...> wrote:
> I have install in the C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1
>
> This is my set enviroment for CLASSPATH:
>
> C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\junit4.9b1.jar;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\org;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\javadoc;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b1\junit\tests
>
>
> But when  I lunch
>
> java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
>
>
> the response is:
>
> java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/junit/runner/JUnitCore
> Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.junit.runner.JUnitCore
>        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
>        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
>        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
>        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
> Could not find the main class: org.junit.runner.JUnitCore.  Program will exit.
> Exception in thread "main"
>
> Is possible help me,
>
> Thank you Emanuela
>
>
>
>
